supportModal.supportText: The fastest way to reach a person for support is to join our Discord server!
supportModal.bugRepText: Please take the time to write an issue and let us make Stereum better!

notifModal.notifText: You can set up different notification sources and the status you want to be notified of here

updatePanel.serviceDesc: Updates for the installed selection of PLUG-INs

displayValidator.waitForImport: Please wait until the key is imported

exitMultipleValidator.passMessage: ENTER YOUR VALIDATOR PASSWORD TO EXIT CHAIN WITH THIS KEY...

exitValidatorModal.modalMessage: Are you sure you want to exit the chain with THE SELECTED validator KEYS? This stops your validator duty & CAN NOT be reversed. Your fund are also only withdrawable, if the chain allows it.
exitValidatorModal.exitApprove: I READ THE TEXT AND I AM AWARE OF THE CONSEQUENCES

feeRecipient.textPlaceHolder: Enter a valid Ethereum address to send your block rewards to ...
feeRecipient.setBlock: SET A BLOCK FEE RECIPIENT ADDRESS

renameValidator.textPlaceHolder: Enter up to 32 characters to rename the validator!

insertValidator.insertText: CLICK OR DRAG TO INSERT KEY

removeSingleModal.question: DO YOU WANT TO DOWNLOAD YOUR SLASHING DATABASE?
removeSingleModal.description: You can IMPORT THIS WITH YOUR VALIDATOR KEYS TO ENSURE YOU ADDITIONAL SAFETY WHEN MIGRATING YOUR KEYS

removeMultiModal.sure: Are you sure you want to remove this key from your machine?
removeMultiModal.path: choose a path to save exported slashing db

removeMultipleValidators.sureText: Are you sure you want to remove All Validator keys FROM THIS MACHINE?

installOption.installText: ON THIS PAGE YOU CAN CHOOSE WHAT YOU WANT TO DO WITH YOUR NODE. AFTER CHOOSING AND PRESSING START A RANDOM CLIENT SELECTION WILL BE TAKEN TO SERVE YOUR USE CASE

installitionMenu.installText: IN THIS STEP YOU CHOOSE HOW YOU WANT TO INSTALL YOUR NODE. IF YOU NEED ASSISTANCE WITH THE SETUP, JOIN OUR DISCORD - WE ARE HAPPY TO HELP YOU OUT
installitionMenu.osCheck: CHECKING IF THE OS OF YOUR SERVER IS SUPPORTED

pluginName.syncClient: SYNCS YOUR CLIENT FROM THE BEGINNING OF THE CHAIN

creditPanel.fincialTitle: GET YOUR NAME ON THE LIST! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING THE DEVELOPMENT!
creditPanel.techText: EARN A GITPOAP! LEARN HOW TO GET INVOLVED BY VISITING OUR GITHUB!

warningModal.warningText: We recommend you to wait until the initial installation is done before applying further changes

frontPageSsv.newRegistritionText: Use the newly generated operator key to register a new node operator into the SSV Network
frontPageSsv.insertTitle: insert operator key for existing operator
frontPageSsv.insertText: Use an existing operator private key to recover your existing node operator's processes

registerSSV.makeSureText: Please make sure to store and backup your operator secret key in a safe place.Do not share this key with anyone.
registerSSV.copyMessage: Copy your public operator key into this field to confirm that you stored your keys!

secretKeyReg.modalLabel: INSERT AN EXISTING PRIVATE OPERATOR KEY TO USE IT AS YOUR OPERATOR KEY

serviceModals.localAppText: Open up the service on your local machine
serviceModals.blockRelTxt: Select one or multiple relays to receive blocks from

customInstallation.customInstallationText: This mode is meant for more advanced users and requires you to have a understanding of how the clients interact with each other. You will have to pick and choose, install and connect every part of your node with the UI yourself before it will be functional!
customInstallation.chooseWhereToInstall: CHOOSE WHERE YOU WANT TO INSTALL STEREUM TO
